'''BCmath''' is an extension that provides arbitrary-precision arithmetic for Lua modules. The module call [https://www.php.net/manual/en/book.bc.php BCMath Arbitrary Precision Mathematics] for PHP through a minimal interface layer.

For a full Vagrant setup, see [https://jeblad.github.io/BCmath/topics/vagrant.md.html the documentation].
